programme.title: Single Sculls, Lightweight Double Sculls, Quadruple Sculls, Pairs | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Finals for the Lightweight Men's Double Sculls Final C, the Lightweight Women's Double Sculls Final C, the Men's Single Sculls Semi-Finals, the Women's Single Sculls Semi-Final, Women's Single Sculls Semi-Final, the Men's Pair Semi-Final , the Women's Pair Semi-Final and the Men's and Women's Quadruple Sculls Finals. The races took place at Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 31/07/24.
The Men's Quadruple Sculls Finals medals went to Netherlands(Gold), Italy(Silver) and Poland(Bronze), The Women's Quadruple Sculls Final was won by Great Britain (Gold), Netherlands (Silver) and Germany(Bronze).

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 8
programme.desc: Olympic twins, the greatest gold medalist in gymnastics, the undefeated Kiwis, ice skating innovation and an unlikely Luxembourg gold.

programme.title: Women's Trap Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Trap Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre. Adriana Ruano (GUA) won Gold, Silvana Stanco (ITA) won Silver, and Penny Smith (AUS) won Bronze.

programme.title: Heroes of The Future 2 | Episode 4
programme.desc: In this episode: Belgian fencer Jolien Corteyn, British taekwondo fighter Aaliyah Powell, and German artistic gymnast Daniel Schwed.

programme.title: Rebeca Andrade: an Olympic fairytale | Wait For It Tokyo 2020
programme.desc: Brazilian gymnast Rebeca Andrade's long and bleak climb from the favelas of Sao Paulo to the podium in Tokyo is a true Olympic fairytale.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 3 | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Day 3 Swimming Semi-Finals and Finals took place at Paris La Defense Arena on 29/07/2024. It includes the Semi-Final for the Women's 100m Backstroke and the Final for Women's 400m Individual Medley, Men's 200m Freestyle, Men's 100m Backstroke, Women's 100m Breaststoke, and Women's 200m Freestyle.

programme.title: United States’ Natalie Coughlin I Legends Live On
programme.desc: A look at the Olympic achievements of twelve-time medallist, Natalie Coughlin, and what she is doing now.

programme.title: Joseph Schooling: The butterfly effect | Wait For It
programme.desc: Joseph Schooling’s 100 m butterfly final, where he races his childhood idol and chases the first-ever gold medal for his country.

programme.title: Men's 10m Air Rifle Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Air Rifle Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 29/07/24. Lihao Sheng (CHN) won Gold with a total of 252.2. Victor Lindgren (SWE) won Silver, and Miran Maricic (CRO) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 10m Air Rifle Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10m Air Rifle Final took place at Chateauroux, France, on the 29/07/24. Hyojin Ban (KOR) won Gold with a total of 251.8. Yuting Huang (CHN) won Silver, and Audrey Gogniat (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: Gamers Vs: Episode 1
programme.desc: Popular Gamers apply their gaming skills to Olympic sports with the help of world-class athletes and international coaches. See how they compete in Fencing, Shooting and Boxing.

programme.title: Men's Synchronised 10m Platform | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Men's Synchonised 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 29/07/24. Lian/Yang (CHN) won Gold, Daley/Williams (GBR) won Silver, and Wiens/Zsombor-Murray (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: What Moves Me (Film)
programme.desc: Watch how world-class athletes overcame common personal barriers and started their own impossible

programme.title: Anatomy of a diver and a gymnast
programme.desc: The first-ever male Jamaican Olympic Diver and a World Champion Italian Gymnast are physically analysed in a lab.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Cyclist: Can Jolanda Neff outperform marathon runners?
programme.desc: The 2014 & 2015 cross-country World Cup winner demonstrates the supreme endurance required of an Olympic mountain biker and road racer.

programme.title: Determined duo hope to help shape UAE's sporting future
programme.desc: Veteran shooter Sheik Saeed Al Maktoum and road cyclist Yousif Mirza have a crucial role to play to help shape the UAE's sporting future.

programme.title: Men's Team Gold Medal Match KOR - FRA | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Team Gold Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 29/07/24. The Republic of Korea won the Gold Medal with a victory over France, who won Silver, 5:1

programme.title: Men's Team Bronze Medal Match TUR - CHN | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Team Bronze Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 29/07/24. Turkey won the Bronze Medal with a victory over the People's Republic of China 6:2

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 1
programme.desc: Usain's Insane 100m record, Norway's close finish, an Aussie Winter Olympian, South Korea archery domination, Perfect Comaneci.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 3
programme.desc: In this episode: hockey tracking systems, tennis gliding shoes, ski helmets for the partially blind, archery technology, and hi-speed cameras for training.

programme.title: Choi (KOR) v Kharlan (UKR)- Women's Sabre Individual Bronze Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Sabre Individual Bronze Medal Bout between Sebin Choi (KOR) and Olga Kharlan (UKR) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Olga Kharlan (UKR) won Bronze with a 15:14 victory over Sebin Choi (KOR).

programme.title: Ilmura (JPN) v Itkin (USA) - Men's Foil Bronze Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Foil Bronze Medal Bout between Kazuki Ilmura (JPN) and Nick Itkin (USA) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste.Nick Itkin (USA) won Bronze with a 15:12 victory over Kazuki Ilmura (JPN).

programme.title: Apithy-Brunet (FRA) v Balzer (FRA) - Women's Sabre Individual Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Sabre Individual Gold Medal Bout between Sara Balzer (FRA) and Manon Apithy-Brunet (FRA) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Manon Apithy-Brunet (FRA) won Gold with a 15:12 victory over Sara Balzer (FRA) who won Silver.

programme.title: Fitness Influencer vs Olympians featuring Brandon White
programme.desc: Fitness social influencer Brandon White is paired with fencer Enzo Lefort, football player Melissa Ortiz and sprinter Chris Brown in order to experience their demanding workouts. Can he keep up?

programme.title: Anatomy of an Archer: The Hidden Strengths of Atanu Das
programme.desc: We took India’s top archer Atanu Das to a sports science labs to uncover the hidden strength of an Olympic archer. With the help of fellow Olympian Lolo Jones, each episode of our sports science original series Anatomy of studies the powers and physiques of an elite athlete to find out what makes them special in their sport.

programme.title: Transform My Meal: France
programme.desc: Four French Olympic athletes meet up with world-class chefs in Paris, La Rochelle and Val d’Isere to learn how to cook haute cuisine at home.

programme.title: Christiana Means: The Road to Recovery | skate-hers
programme.desc: Christiana Means, a 25-year-old skateboarder from the Philippines raised in South Carolina, moved to LA to pursue her dream. After major knee surgery and a year of recovery, she's back and more motivated than ever to push her limits in skateboarding.

programme.title: The graceful journey of Olympic champion, Jessica von Bredow-Werndl | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Jessica’s dream became reality at Tokyo 2020 with two Olympic Gold medals in dressage in the individual and team event. But her incredible bond with her horse, Dalera, is forged by hard work and an implacable discipline at Aubenhausen world-class riding centre. With her title back on the line at Paris 2024, she opens the doors of her family estate and reflects, with her family and her team, on an emotional journey full of joy and determination.

programme.title: Eventing Jumping Team & Individual | Equestrian | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Eventing Jumping Team & Individual took place at Chateau de Versailles, Versailles, on 29/07/24.
In the Eventing Team Final, Great Britain won the Gold, France won Silver, and Japan completed the podium.
In the Eventing Individual Final, Michael Jung (GER) won the Gold Medal, Christopher Burton (AUS) won the Silver Medal, and Laura Collet (GBR) won Bronze.

programme.title: Inspired by Sport (Film)
programme.desc: Olympians visit inspiring community sports organizations to witness the power of sport to transform lives.

programme.title: Men's Team Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Team Final took place at the Bercy Arena, Paris, on 29/07/24. Team Japan won Gold, People's Republic of China won Silver, and the United States of America finished the podium.

programme.title: What moves me | Samir Ait Said: Finding strength in pain
programme.desc: Samir Ait Said, French artistic gymnast, suffered a severe leg injury at Rio 2016. Through a difficult comeback, while also dealing with the loss of his father, he shares the emotional journey he has been on in the last four years. From long rehabilitation to a painful mourning, he never gave up his Olympic dream and managed to find strength from his pain.

programme.title: Viktoriia: Ukraine’s Gymnastics Hope
programme.desc: As the bombs dropped in her hometown of Kyiv and her father left home to fight in the war, Ukrainian rhythmic gymnast Viktoriia Onopriienko battled daily to make her dream – competing in Paris 2024 – come true. This documentary showcases her grit, resilience and determination in her inspiring journey to compete at the Olympic Games. Discover the indomitable spirit of this young athlete as she prepares to represent Ukraine on the world stage.

programme.title: All Around | Angelina Melnikova's journey to Olympic gold
programme.desc: A special episode following gymnasts Angelina Melnikova of Russia, USA’s Morgan Hurd, and China’s Chen Yile through the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games qualifiers.

programme.title: Original Fuel (Film)
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, athletes representing young republics have forged their own path to DIY training and Olympic success.

programme.title: Women's Epee Team Bronze Medal Match | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Epee Team Bronze Medal match between Poland and China took place on 30/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. Poland took the Bronze medal. Final Score POL 32:31 CHN.

programme.title: Women's Epee Team Gold Medal Match | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Epee Team Gold Medal match between Italy and France took place on 30/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. Italy took the Gold medal and France took Silver. Final Score ITA 30:29 FRA.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 4
programme.desc: In this episode: weightlifting training platforms, digital cycling trainers, equestrian analytics, lactic acid monitoring, and the tech behind wireless fencing.

programme.title: Athletes Under Fire - Episode 3: Iraq & Syria
programme.desc: Iraqi Paralympian, Ammar Ali, and Syria's only Olympic swimmer, Bayan Jumah, dream of inspiring a new generation of Olympians.

programme.title: Men's Trap Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Trap Finals took place on 30/07/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre. Nathan Hales (GBR) won Gold, Qi Ying (CHN) won Silver, and Jean Pierre Brol Cardenas (GUA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Changing Times
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.5, Program 3 : The story of Women at the Games, Changing Times.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -63kg, Men's -81kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's -63kg and Men's -81kg Repechage, Semifinal and Final took place on 30/07/2024 at the Champs-de-Mars Arena. Andreja Leski (SLO) took the Women's -63kg Gold and Takanori Nagase (JPN) took the Men's -81kg Gold.

programme.title: Men's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x200m Freestyle was held on 30/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Great Britain claimed the Gold with a time of 6:59.43, The United States of America took Silver and Australia completed the podium.

programme.title: Meet the transgender swim star who’s earned a spot on the men’s team
programme.desc: Schuyler Bailar is a decorated swimmer who was recruited to Harvard as a female, but has found peace after transitioning to a male.

programme.title: Becoming an Olympic Legend | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after his famous tally of seven Olympic gold medals and seven world records, legendary swimmer Mark Spitz makes an emotional return to Munich Olympic Park and the swimming pool, where his life was changed forever.

programme.title: Memory Lane | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after their Olympic victories in Munich, famed gymnast Olga Korbut, Germany’s long jump star Heide Rosendahl, Kenya’s long-distance running hero Kip Keino and Great Britain’s celebrated pentathlete Mary Peters make an emotional return to the scene of their gold medal wins.

programme.title: Changing Times
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.5, Program 3 : The story of Women at the Games, Changing Times.

programme.title: Men's 200m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Freestyle was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. David Popovici (ROU) claimed Gold with a time of 1:44.72. Matthew Richards (GBR) took Silver and Luke Hobson (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Backstroke was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Thomas Ceccon (ITA) claimed Gold with a time of 52.00, Xu Jiayu (CHN) took Silver and Ryan Murphy (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 100m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 100m Breaststroke was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Tatjana Smith (RSA) claimed Gold with a time of 1:05.28, Qianting Tang (CHN) took Silver and Mona McSharry (IRL) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Freestyle was held on 29/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Mollie O'Callaghan (AUS) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record time of 1:53.27, Ariarne Titmus (AUS) took Silver and Siobhan Bernadette Haughey (HKG) completed the podium.

programme.title: Where are they now? Ian Thorpe’s legend lives on
programme.desc: Thorpe reached the pinnacle of his sport by winning five gold medals, but after retiring he had to find inner peace to succeed again

programme.title: Identify
programme.desc: The inspiring journey of five transgender athletes and how sport helped them find their true identity.

programme.title: CHN -PRK - Mixed Doubles Finals | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Finals beteween China v Democratic People's Republic of Korea took place at South Paris Arena 4 on 30/07/24. China won Gold with a final score CHN 4:4 PKR.

programme.title: Fitness Influencer vs Olympians featuring Susana Yabar
programme.desc: Fitness social influencer Susana Yabar is paired with Olympic medallist Natasha Hastings, Ukrainian triathlete Yuliya Yelisatratova and table tennis star Hugo Caldenaro to see if she can hang with their intense workouts.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 8
programme.desc: In this episode: table tennis robot trainers, boxing trackers, regenerative clothing, cycling smart glasses, aerodynamic sails, and football goal control.

programme.title: USA v AUS Women's Bronze Medal Match | Rugby | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match between USA and Australia took place on 30/07/2024, at the Stade de France. Final Score USA 14:12 AUS.

programme.title: NZL v CAN Women's Gold Medal Match | Rugby | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match between New Zealand and Canada took place on 30/07/2024, at the Stade de France. New Zealand won Gold. Final Score NZL 19:12 CAN.
